userSettings.name: wikiUrl
userSettings.label: DokuWiki URL
userSettings.description: The full URL to your DokuWiki instance (e.g., https://wiki.example.com)

userSettings.name: authMethod
userSettings.label: Authentication Method
userSettings.description: Choose authentication method (Basic Auth for username/password or Bearer Token for token-based auth)

userSettings.name: username
userSettings.label: Username
userSettings.description: Your DokuWiki username (only required for Basic Auth)

userSettings.name: password
userSettings.label: Password/Token
userSettings.description: Your DokuWiki password (for Basic Auth) or Bearer token (for Token Auth)

openaiSpec.name: manage_dokuwiki

operation.description: The operation to perform on the DokuWiki instance

pageId.description: The ID of the wiki page to operate on

mediaId.description: The ID of the media file to operate on

content.description: The content to write to the page or file

namespace.description: The namespace to list pages or media from

searchQuery.description: The search query for finding pages

openaiSpec.description: Manage DokuWiki websites through the JSON-RPC API. Perform operations on wiki pages and media files.
